summary: This document is an email chain from July 27, 2019, regarding the status of inmate Jeffrey Epstein. It contains updates on his psychological observation, his complaints about conditions during legal visits, and his anxiety about being returned to the Special Housing Unit (SHU).

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate being discussed; he is on psychological observation, complains about dehydration due to limited bathroom breaks during long legal visits, and expresses anxiety about returning to the SHU.

events.title: Psychological Observation Update for Epstein
events.description: An email update is provided on inmate Jeffrey Epstein's status, noting he is on psychological observation, seems stable, and is currently at a legal visit. He complains about conditions and anxiety regarding the SHU.

keyFacts: On July 27, 2019, Jeffrey Epstein was reported to be on psychological observation but appeared stable.
Epstein complained of dehydration, attributing it to limited bathroom breaks during his approximately 12-hour legal visits with his attorney.
Epstein expressed anxiety about being returned to the Special Housing Unit (SHU), citing an inability to sleep due to noise from other inmates.
